name: Google - Right Corner Links
description:
Makes the user bar (top right), look like the corner links in Gmail/Gcal.  Works for Gmail, Google reader, and Google Personalized Home.

Update 1:
Now works on Google search results and Google images.  Also most Google domains (e.g. .jp, .ca, and .fr).  As well as https connections.

Update 2:
Now includes Google Calendar.

Update 3:
Small update for Google reader, gives it a white background.

Update 4:
Background color, font family, and font size.

Update 5:
Gives Google's (on the left), the same background color.
